## BaseTechniqueParams interface

Common attributes or all \[\[Technique\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [category](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.category.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt; | The category of this technique.<!-- -->The category is used in conjunction with \[\[Theme.priorities\]\] to assign render orders to the objects created by this \[\[Style\]\]. |
|  [enabled](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.enabled.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | Runtime filtering of techniques.<!-- -->Use with <code>['dynamic-properties']</code> operator for dynamic feature highlight, highlighig etc. Picking example - \[\[PickingExample\]\] |
|  [fadeFar](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.fadefar.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Distance to the camera (0.0 = camera position, 1.0 = farPlane) at which the object has zero opacity and stops fading out. An undefined value disables fading. |
|  [fadeNear](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.fadenear.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Distance to the camera (0.0 = camera position, 1.0 = farPlane) at which the object start fading out (opacity decreases). |
|  [id](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.id.md) | string | The name used to identify materials created from this technique. |
|  [kind](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.kind.md) | [GeometryKind](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykind.md) \| [GeometryKindSet](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.md) | Specified kind of geometry. One kind is set as default in the technique, and can be overridden in the style. |
|  [renderOrder](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.renderorder.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | The render order of the objects created using this technique.<!-- -->If not specified in style file, \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\] will assign monotonically increasing values according to style position in file. |
|  [transient](./harp-datasource-protocol.basetechniqueparams.transient.md) | boolean | Optional. If <code>true</code>, no IDs will be saved for the geometry this technique creates. |
